text: Notoacmea flammea is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== Basal view ==References== * Nakano T. & Ozawa T. (2007). Worldwide phylogeography of limpets of the order Patellogastropoda: molecular, morphological and paleontological evidence. Journal of Molluscan Studies 73(1): 79–99. ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1834
title: Notoacmea flammea
